unix:runlevel_test.comment: Ensure the PostgreSQL Runlevel '3' is set to 'on'

ind:sql57_test.comment: Ensure the log destinations are set correctly
Ensure the logging collector is enabled
Ensure the log file destination directory is set correctly
Ensure the filename pattern for log files is set correctly
Ensure the log file permissions are set to '0600'
Ensure the maximum log file lifetime is set correctly
Ensure the maximum log file size is set correctly
Ensure the correct syslog facility is selected
Ensure the program name for PostgreSQL syslog messages is correct
Ensure the correct messages are sent to the database client
Ensure the correct messages are written to the server log
Ensure the correct SQL statements generating errors are recorded
Ensure all temporary files are logged
Ensure the PostgreSQL Audit Extension (pgAudit) is enabled
Ensure SSL is enabled and configured correctly

ind:unknown_test.comment: Ensure FIPS 140-2 OpenSSL Cryptography Is Used

ind:sql57_test.comment: Ensure the pgcrypto extension is installed and configured correctly

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure WAL archiving is configured and functional
Ensure SSH as a transport medium

ind:sql57_test.comment: Ensure PostgreSQL configuration files are outside the data cluster
Ensure PostgreSQL subdirectory locations are outside the data cluster

unix:runlevel_object.comment: Ensure the PostgreSQL Runlevel '3' is set to 'on'

ind:sql57_object.ind:sql: select regexp_matches(setting, '\/.*\/') from pg_settings where name = 'data_directory';
select name, setting, unit from pg_settings where context like '%backend%' order by 1;
select name, setting, unit from pg_settings where context like '%backend%' order by 1;
select name, setting, unit from pg_settings where context like '%backend%' order by 1;
select name, setting, unit from pg_settings where context like '%backend%' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'postmaster' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'sighup' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'superuser' order by 1;
select name, setting from pg_settings where context = 'user' order by 1;
SELECT name, setting FROM pg_settings WHERE name IN ('hba_file','ident_file','ssl_cert_file','ssl_key_file','ssl_ca_file','ssl_crl_file','krb_server_keyfile');
SELECT name, setting FROM pg_settings WHERE name IN ('data_directory','log_directory' ,'default_tablespace' ,'temp_tablespaces');

unix:runlevel_state.comment: Ensure the PostgreSQL Runlevel '3' is set to 'on'

external_variable.comment: Ensure the log destinations are set correctly
Ensure the logging collector is enabled
Ensure the log file destination directory is set correctly
Ensure the filename pattern for log files is set correctly
Ensure the log file permissions are set to '0600'
Ensure the maximum log file lifetime is set correctly
Ensure the maximum log file size is set correctly
Ensure the correct syslog facility is selected
Ensure the program name for PostgreSQL syslog messages is correct
Ensure the correct messages are sent to the database client
Ensure the correct messages are written to the server log
Ensure the correct SQL statements generating errors are recorded
Ensure all temporary files are logged
Ensure the PostgreSQL Audit Extension (pgAudit) is enabled
Ensure SSL is enabled and configured correctly
